revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=WL-HDD |revision=2.5 |upc= |ean= |asin=B000FHJ3JC;JP;,B0007YB9KY;DE; |newegg=N82E16833320110 |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=07/30/2004 |manuf_country= |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=mobile NAS, access point |fcc_id=MSQWLHDD25 |ic_id= |pwr_v=5 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Broadcom |cpu1_model=BCM4702;BCM4702KPB; |cpu1_cspeed=125 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX29LV320ATTC-90 |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY57V283220T-7 |expansion_if_types=USB 1.1,IDE (2.5") |expansion_ide_num=1 |expansion_usb_num=1 |jtag=yes |serial=yes |wi1_chip1_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip1_model=BCM4306 |wi1_chip2_brand=Broadcom |wi1_chip2_model=BCM2050 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=RP-SMA |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8201CP |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=IDE Controller;Promise;PDC20265R;;1; ,,, RTC chip;Ricoh;RV5C386A; |flags=HDD, RTC, battery |tp_firmware=Oleg (wl500g), OpenWrt |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=WL-HDD |default_ssid_regex=^WL-HDD$ |default_ip=192.168.1.220 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=00:11:2F,00:11:D8 |oui_eth=00:11:2F,00:11:D8 }} {{TagLine|Wireless Hard Disk Drive Box}} :[https://www.asus.com/ru/support/Download/11/2/0/9/8/ Support page]
''Yakumo Wireless Storage 60'' :[http://pc.watch.impress.co.jp/docs/2004/1209/pclabo28.htm Pictures and information] (JP)
Default SSIDs are per '''WiGLE''' data for the (presumed) default SSID. :Possible additional OUI of 00:13:D4..
===Wikis=== *[http://wlhdd.co.uk/wiki/Main_Page '''Asus WL-HDD''' wiki] *[http://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/asus/wlhdd2.5 On the '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
===Forum threads=== *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?753-Asus-WL-HDD-inside-pics!! ''Asus WL-HDD inside'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] *[http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?14297-WL-HDD-sdram-from-16-to-32MB ''WL-HDD SDRAM from 16MB to 32MB'' on '''wl500g.info''' forums] :There is a ''[http://www.promise.com Promise]'' PDC20265R IDE controller on-board. :[http://www.ic-on-line.cn/view_online.php?id=1868902&file=0435\rv5c386a_5464726.pdf Ricoh RV5C386A] [http://wl500g.info/showthread.php?1642-Real-time-clock-with-Oleg-s-firmware/page3 RTC chip] used by WL-HDD.
